messages.subject: DIVINE CALL FROM GOD.(FROM MRS ROSE MARTINS TOYO)
messages.body:
Praise be to the name of God most high. I am the above named person from
Tunisia but now undergoing medical treatment.

I was married to Dr.Martins Toyo who worked with Tunisia embassy in ABIDJAN for
nine years, before he died in the year 2002. We were both married for eleven
years without children.



He died after a brief illness that lasted for only four days. Before his death
we were both Christians and since his death I decided not to re-marry. When my
late husband was alive he deposited the sum of USD5,500,000.00 (Five Million
Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars) in cash,packaged in bundles into a
metalic box.

Recently, my Doctor told me that I would not last for the next Six months due
to my cancer illness. Having known my condition and believing the doctor I have
decided to donate this fund to avoid total loss to church, Less privilege, or
better still a Christian individual that will utilize this money the way I am
going to instruct herein.

I am interested in helping orphanages ,widows and propagating the Gospel and to
ensure that the house of God is maintained. Please do not fail to spread the
funds across the globe.

The Bible made us to understand that it is more blessed to give than to
receive. I took this decision because I don't have any child that will inherit
this money and my husband relatives are fighting over the properties and I
don't want my husband's hard earned money to be misused by their greedy
attitude. I don't want a situation where this money will be used in an UNGODLY
manner, hence the reason for taking this bold decision. I am not afraid of
death since I am a good christian. I know that I am going to be in the bosom of
the Lord. The bible says that the lord will fight my case and I shall hold my
peace. I don't need any telephone communication in this regard because of my
health, and because of the presence of my husband's relatives around me always.
I don't want them to know about this development. With God all things are
possible. As soon as I receive your reply I shall give you the contact
information of the lawyer in charge of taking care of negotiations on this and
other
 details that will enable you claim the box from the security company in Europe

I will also issue you a letter of authority/Power of Attorney that will make
you the beneficiary of this fund. I want you to always pray for me because the
lord is my shepherd. My happiness is that I lived a life of a worthy Christian.
Whoever that wants to serve the Lord must serve him in spirit and truth. Please
always be prayerful all through your life.

I sent you this mail under severe pains. Any delay in your reply will be
detrimental. Please assure me that you will act accordingly

Remain blessed in the name of the Lord.

Yours in Christ,

Mrs. ROSE  Martins Toyo.

messages.body:
Mrs Rose:

Praise the Lord, Allelluyah!

Your message came literally from Heaven, as we were praying for some help to go
on with our Mission.

I am Brother Samuel Vimes, of Our Lady of Constant Distress Mission of the
Bethamithe Church. We are committed to help the less fortunates. In our case we
are dedicated to the poor of the slums called Villa Tachito, in Argentina.
Everyday we give two hot meals to 538 kids and provide them and their families
with clothes, job opportunities and such.

We were planning to build a church, a hospital and a school for this poor
community but, alas!, our funds don't let us fulfill our plans as wished.

Your kindfull donation comes as a Blessing from God Himself. I asure you that
you will bring smiles to all those 538 dirty faces. I am not the one to say
what Jesus would do, but if I were Him, you will be seating at my right for all
the Eternity, blessed in Heaven for ever and ever.
Oh, dear lady, you'll pass away with joy and grace in your heart and in your
soul!

 

In short: I am your humble servant and I will do everything that I can to serve
you best.

In fact, to give you the confidentiality you ask me, I opened another email
account, xxxxxxxxxx, since this one is the one I use in official communications
of the Mission and I usually share the messages that arrive there with the
other Brothers. Please, from now on, use the alternative address, thanks.

 

Yours in the Name of Jesus, Mary, Eloi and Betham

Hello

without anybody knowing about it,except me.May his gentle soul rest in peace.
As i am now, i have nothing ,whatever i had on me personally has been used in
treating my illness but i am still not well.But the Doctor gave me a good news
on the last tests he conducted on me three days ago.He says he is surprises to
notice that i will last more than he previously predicted.There is nothing to
be surprise about, it is the God's work, through the prayers given to me by
people like you.

What i want you to do for me is to help me  claim the consignment contaning the
money from the security company.I will present you as our long time family
friend and christian associate, and beneficiary to the consignment with a legal
change of ownership in your name,as to be prepared by the lawyer here.Feel free
to call the lawyer in charge of this here.He is in the person of BARRISTER
ELANGA KOFFI .His phone number is 225-0738 60 66 and email address is
elanga_koffi@yahoo.com, i have given him power to conclude everything about
this since i am not strong enough now.

There is a volatile political situation down here and i do not want the money
to be  used here.To prepare the change of ownership in your name, the lawyer
will need your full names ,address,phone and fax number.After the change of
ownership, giving you the power to claim the box , you will make arangements to
come down here for the claim.

After the claim, we arrange with the security company to use their "special
diplomatic delivery service" to convey the box to your country .

The other way round, the money can be taken to a bank here after the claim and
be remitted into your bank account,from here.

Kindly keep this transaction absolutely confidential because in the issue of
money, not even your closest friend or relative can be trusted.

You must not let the security company know it is money that is contained in the
boxes, the boxes containing the money were declared as containing just family
valuables of photographic materials and classified documents.My husband
deposited it under the 'special diplomatic deposit category(the kind of deposit
in which the security company does not open to inspect the contents) He was
very wise to have done it that way because if they knew,maybe they would have
become greedy and plan on how to take over the treasure.It is only you and i
that know it contains money.

I will scan and send you my photograph and i will like you to send me yours
too.

God bless you and guide you in your going out and your coming in.

 

I expect to hear from you,quickly.

Mrs Rose Martins Toyo

Dear Barrister Koffi

Your message leaves me unsettled.

What's that thing you say about the money I have to pay?

Didn't Mrs Rose explain you my situation????

I'm in charge of a Christian mission that feeds and gives education, clothes
and job opportunities to 538 poor kids from a slum neighbourhood in Argentina.
With 19.000 dollars we can provide them all this for half a year! Do you think
that I can take away the happiness of their lives?

You are unchristian to think the contrary!

And I am the Brother in charge of the economics and finances of the Mission but
I have to respond to my Superiors. Mrs Rose instructed me to keep all this
business secret and I tried to grant her her wish, since I am allowed to keep
the secret of a donation AS FAR AS IT REMAINS AS A DONATION. As soon as I have
to take money from the communal funds I MUST respond to Bextor Lithmann and
Bishop Flynn.

I undestand you are willing to put some of the ammount from your own dry

 We are living on Hell here. It was just now I have a spare time to answer my
email correspondence.

last time, another one came, and harder. We lost three Brothers and seven
children, and we have plenty of injuries (in fact, my left leg is in a terrible
condition and my lungs got seriously damaged).

eating babies from their cradles, energy lines falling and electrocuting
everybody nearby, winds at 100 Km/h, trees flying amok on the air... it was a
nightmare!

originally that he had raised 13.000 dollars on his own but the debt was
19.000. Later he told me that he managed to cut the debt to the half, that is
9.500 dollars. I don't know, but I think that he can pay that with the 13.000
dollars he previously had. Or that stash also was cut in half????

Please! He seems to be greedy or has a heart of steel!

lawyer of yours to manage the situation with the seccurity company without
involving a payment from our side. It would be cruel of him to ask for money to
people who is in the deepest of miseries.

 

And please, please, I beg you, send also clothes, food, medicines, whatever is
helpful to help us overcome this dreadful situation.

 

Thanks.

 

Be blessed in the names of Jesus, Mary, Eloi and Betham.

Mission is helping, you only wanted to scam us, to get our money and fly away!
